hypothesis_content.title: PolitiFi Memecoin Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: During neutral-to-bullish regimes, when major PolitiFi memecoins (TRUMP, BODEN) experience a sustained period of low volatility (20-day historical volatility < 60%, vs. 90-day avg of 120%), a volatility expansion event is imminent. A breakout above the 20-day ATR-based volatility band will lead to a directional trend lasting 5-7 days, with the direction signaled by the concurrent 4h trend of BTC.
hypothesis_content.rationale: PolitiFi memecoins are driven by event catalysts and social sentiment, not fundamentals. Periods of low volatility represent coiled sentiment. The eventual catalyst (news headline, poll, debate clip) triggers a violent move. The direction is often gated by overall crypto market risk sentiment (proxied by BTC's short-term trend).
entry_conditions: 20-day Historical Volatility of TRUMP or BODEN < 60%
Asset trading in a 10% price range for > 7 days
BTC 4h trend is clearly defined (e.g., above/below its 20-period MA)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Position reaches +25% return OR 20-day HV returns above 100%
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Position reaches -12% return OR price closes back inside the prior 10% range

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: The breakout fails to sustain, price reverts into the prior range within 24h, or volatility expands without a clear directional trend (i.e., a volatile chop).
